name: Ahmed Ekram Alsada
summary: DevOps Engineer with strong expertise in Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, CI/CD, and infrastructure automation. Passionate about building scalable, reliable, and secure cloud environments with a focus on automation and DevOps best practices.

experience.title: DevOps Intern
tasks: Completed 600+ hours of intensive training covering DevOps, cloud, Linux, networking, and automation.
Developed end-to-end CI/CD pipelines for automated deployments.
Gained hands-on experience with AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, and Terraform.
Enhanced teamwork and communication through collaborative technical projects.

projects.title: My Portfolio Website
points: Developed a modern and fully responsive portfolio website.
Integrated a JSON-based dynamic content system.
Deployed using GitHub Pages with a custom domain.

projects.title: Company Website
points: Built a professional and responsive company website.
Deployed on Google Apps Script with a custom domain.

projects.title: CI/CD Pipeline Automation
points: Automated build, test, and deployment pipelines.
Integrated SonarQube for code quality and security scanning.
Reduced deployment time and eliminated manual errors.

projects.title: AWS Infrastructure Deployment
points: Designed and deployed scalable and secure cloud infrastructure.
Configured VPC networking, subnets, routing, and IAM roles.
Implemented monitoring and alerting using CloudWatch.

education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering in Communications and Electronics Engineering
